title: Hyundai explains how it plans to become one of the world's top three EV makers by 2030
description: The automaker is investing heavily in research and development, building new plants and platforms as well as expanding EV lines and production capacity.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Slowing inflation didn't excite investors
description: Slowing inflation elicited only a muted response from markets, suggesting that investors are preoccupied with other concerns.

title: Disney’s streaming losses improve even as subscriber numbers decline
description: Disney is also in the process of laying off thousands of employees under CEO Bob Iger's restructuring plan.

title: Google will label fake images created with its A.I.
description: The data inside the images won't be a visible watermark, but software like Google Search will be able to read it.

title: Carl Icahn's company stock falls as much as 20% after prosecutors seek financial information
description: Federal investigators contacted Icahn Enterprises last Wednesday seeking information about corporate governance and other materials.

title: Microsoft skips salary increases for full-time employees this year
description: Now that it's in cost-saving mode, Microsoft is foregoing salary increases this year after giving raises to some employees in 2022 to meet inflation.

title: Early MIT research shows 'Industrial Revolution-level large' leap for workers using ChatGPT, generative AI
description: New MIT research shows ChatGPT creating gains at work that rival the Industrial Revolution and steam engine, says CEO of Google-linked AI startup Cohere.

title: Traders raise the chances for a Fed rate cut following April inflation report
description: Traders on Wednesday raised the chances of a September interest rate cut to close to 80%.

title: Inflation rose 4.9% in April from a year ago, less than expectations
description: The consumer price index was expected to rise 0.4% in April, according to Dow Jones.

title: Here's why sodium-ion batteries are shaping up to be a big technology breakthrough
description: Although still in its infancy, the global market for sodium-ion batteries is expected to be worth over $11 billion by 2033.

title: UK man pleads guilty to Twitter hack that compromised accounts of Joe Biden, Elon Musk
description: Joseph O'Connor, 23, submitted his guilty plea in a New York court on Tuesday, according to a Department of Justice press release.

title: Putin's 'one-tank' military parade was an embarrassment for Russia, analysts say
description: Russia's scaled-down Victory Day military parade highlighted the country's depleted resources.

title: Air New Zealand's planned in-flight sleeping pods could cost nearly $100 an hour
description: Air New Zealand provided more details about its previously announced in-flight sleeping pods, including estimated costs and routes.

title: Twitter to launch encrypted direct messages with voice and video chat to follow, Elon Musk says
description: Twitter could launch encrypted direct messages on Wednesday, Elon Musk said, as the CEO outlined plans to boost communication features on the social media app.

title: Ireland wants to put its soaring corporate tax receipts into a new sovereign wealth fund
description: Multinationals in Ireland have paid record amounts of corporate tax in recent years, and the country estimates its budget surplus could hit 6.3% of GDP.

title: Microsoft ramps up A.I. game with bet on startup that helps coding novices build apps
description: The deal signifies a further bid by Microsoft to ramp up its efforts in AI, which has become a key focus for the company.

title: Bank of England set for 12th straight interest rate hike, but the outlook remains murky
description: The Bank of England is expected to hike interest rates for the 12th consecutive meeting on Thursday as inflation continues to run hot.
